text: Gas leak evacuates hotel and pub: A hotel and pub with 30 people inside are evacuated following a gas leak in ... http://bbc.in/1Lo3WyN
Please RT. Avondale Road, Chapel Lane and Pontrhydyrun Road are currently closed due to a gas leak. More info at http://www.torfaen.gov.uk/en/News/2015/October/08-GasleakonAvondaleRoad.aspx …
